conversion_verification.notes: The second image is a true 3D cutaway (walls have height/thickness, angled view, ceiling removed), but it does not represent the provided 2D plan's full layout; over half the rooms/spaces are missing or not modeled.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Skipped due to automatic rejection (layout completeness failure vs. source plan).

detected_errors.description: More than 50% of the spaces from the 2D plan are missing/not represented in the 3D model (e.g., multiple bedrooms, toilets/bathrooms, balconies, utility/servant areas, dress/foyer regions).
Overall room configuration and adjacency relationships do not match the 2D plan; the 3D model appears to be a smaller, generic apartment layout rather than a faithful extrusion of the source plan.

summary: Although the second image is genuinely 3D, it is not a faithful 3D conversion of the provided 2D plan because most rooms/spaces are missing or reconfigured.
